title: Audio Frequency range of LoL
body:
Greetings, I ask of anyone of what frequency range of sounds league of Legends sends to the speakers.

Something along the lines of number-number. I ask this since im buying a subwoofer and I am wondering if its more or less capable of what the game sending to it. Its a personal project and im buying it no matter what really.

Subwoofer:Dayton 1200 12" from parts-express.

replies.body:
Hey there HEXXEN9x,

It looks like that sub covers 25Hz-125Hz. League will contain information in that frequency range.

Warning: Garen ulting with that thing may set off car alarms...
I feel like we need more mods like you!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jb1pGvde,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-15T21:10:45.248+0000)
>
> Hey there HEXXEN9x,
> 
> It looks like that sub covers 25Hz-125Hz. League will contain information in that frequency range.
> 
> Warning: Garen ulting with that thing may set off car alarms...

FOR DEMACIA! {{champion:86}}
